casebody.data:
Margaret BELL, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Richard C. KLEIN, Esquire, Richard C. Klein, P.C., and Spector, Gadon & Rosen, Defendants-Petitioners. C-244 September Term 2017
079865 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 26, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003523-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
